amazon.text: It seems that only fragments of the original text remain in the Lorem Ipsum texts used today.
amazon.author: Thomas Israel

google.text: The most well-known dummy text is the 'Lorem Ipsum', which is said to have originated in the 16th century.
google.author: Carl Oliver

lenovo.text: One disadvantage of Lorum Ipsum is that in Latin certain letters appear more frequently than others.
lenovo.author: Barbara McIntosh

paypal.text: Thus, Lorem Ipsum has only limited suitability as a visual filler for German texts.
paypal.author: Jill Webb

shopify.text: There is now an abundance of readable dummy texts. These are usually used when a text is required.
shopify.author: Dean Tolle

shopify1.text: According to most sources, Lorum Ipsum can be traced back to a text composed by Cicero.
shopify1.author: Christa Smith
